title: We are conscious of inflation, it does affect planning: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman - Moneycontrol.com

description: India's capacities have still not grown in oilseed production; neither are we producing enough pulses for the countryâ€™s consumption needs, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman has said.
